channel.title: Player text above head rep ++

item.title: Player text above head rep ++
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

tyb97:

Check out PI’s forcedChat method, that could give you a good idea on how to make your own.

I’d rather no go to the trouble of downloading a PI, this is straight from the vengeance code in a delta for vengeance:

AttackingOn2.plrText = "Taste vengeance!"; // This says it in itself. AttackingOn2.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; // Make sure the txt4 will update.

But with the attacking on removed.

Read full topic

item.title: Player text above head rep ++
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

I’m working on randoms for my server, how would I go about adding text above head?

[code]if(command.startsWith(“chat”)) {
plrText = “test”; // This says it in itself.
plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
sM(“testa”);

}[/code]
Only the sM works. Why won’t the text?

Read full topic
